description: A job response list shall be defined as a collection of job responses for a specific period of time and selected work centers or other resources.
comment: According to ANSI/ISA-95.00.04-2018 Enterprise-Control System Integration âˆ’ Part 4: Objects and Attributes for - Approved 24 May 2018

contents.name: isMadeUpOf
contents.description: The job response(s) that make up this job response list.

contents.name: version
contents.description: An identification of the version of the job response list.

enumValues.name: mixed
enumValues.comment: can be used when the activity contains several categories

contents.name: startTime
contents.description: The starting time of this job response list.

contents.name: endTime
contents.description: The ending time of this job response list.

contents.name: hierarchyScope
contents.description: Identifies where the exchanged information fits within the role based equipment hierarchy. Optionally, hierarchy scope defines the scope of the equipment class, such as the site or area where it is defined.

contents.name: hierarchyScopeRel
contents.comment: Not part of the Standard Specs.
